      • timeout

        public int timeout
        Timeout value for the process execution, after that timeout, the process will be killed. Default value is 10000 (10 seconds); set to -1 to give no limit to the execution.

      • waitBetweenCalls

        public int waitBetweenCalls
        Value to wait between calls in hte iterative monitor

      • helpOption

        public java.lang.String helpOption
        Define here the commanline option to obtain the command help. Usually it's -h or --help. This will generate the default description for the module.
